dialogSection.dialog: This is my placeholder dialog. I'm not really sure what that means, but the programmer told me that it's important that I say it. So here I am saying it. Oh and he also told me to say that this line should word-wrap.
Well I'm not really sure what he wants me to say, but what can you do?
Oh look! I can talk really fast! I can say so much more in such a fast time! How EXCITING!
ORRRR I can talk reeeeeeaaaalllly slooooowwllllyyyyy...
But why would I want to do THAT?
WHO are you TALKING to, Pinkie?!
Oh, by the way. This dialog and the next one won't wait for you to push a button.
Anyway, that concludes the placeholder dialog. I guess we have to get back to saving the world and stuffs... Bye!
